achievements: Founded the Wrigley Company, known for its chewing gum brands like Juicy Fruit and Doublemint.
Owned the Chicago Cubs baseball team from 1921 to his death in 1932.
Inheriting and expanding the Wrigley Company.
Longtime owner of the Chicago Cubs (from 1932 to his death in 1977)
Helped establish the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League during World War II.
